title: Getting Started with Infinispan data grid -the right way
content: Infinispan is a distributed in-memory key/value data grid. An in-memory data grid is a form of middleware that stores sets of data for use in one or more applications, primarily in memory. The data is typically distributed across grid nodes in a network. Updated with the latest version of Infinispan: â€“ You can use Infinispan ...  The post appeared first on .
